argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | clscld.1 | |- X = U. J |
| 2 | 1 | #P_topcld | |- ( J e. Top -> X e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_ssid | |- X C_ X |
| 4 | 1 | #P_iscld3 | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ X C_ X ) -> ( X e. ( Clsd ` J ) <-> ( ( cls ` J ) ` X ) = X ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( J e. Top -> ( X e. ( Clsd ` J ) <-> ( ( cls ` J ) ` X ) = X ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_mpbid | |- ( J e. Top -> ( ( cls ` J ) ` X ) = X ) |
